localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
I think it’s going to be very obvious looking back in a number of years that the advent of social networks increased the number of micro bubbles in the markets

Even if it dies down for a while this stuff is not going away

Faster markets are here to stay
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
我想若干年后回过头来看会非常明显，社交网络的出现增加了市场的微泡沫数量

即使它消失了一段时间，这东西是不会消失的。

更快的市场将继续存在

我想若干年後回過頭來看會非常明顯，社交網絡的出現增加了市場的微泡沫數量

即使它消失了一段時間，這東西是不會消失的。

更快的市場將繼續存在

previous.excerpt: Over 20% of females struggle with a hormone-related issue such as PCOS, endometriosis, or amenorrhea. Pollie is your friend at every step of your hormonal health journey, from finding your best-fit specialist to symptom tracking.
previous.title: Pollie - Hormonal health, simplified

localize.description: 20% 以上的女性都在为荷尔蒙相关的问题而烦恼，如 PCOS、子宫内膜异位症或闭经。在您的荷尔蒙健康之旅的每一步，从寻找最适合您的专家到症状跟踪，Pollie都是您的朋友。
20% 以上的女性都在爲荷爾蒙相關的問題而煩惱，如 PCOS、子宮內膜異位症或閉經。在您的荷爾蒙健康之旅的每一步，從尋找最適合您的專家到症狀跟蹤，Pollie都是您的朋友。

next.excerpt: WellBuddy is a smart wellbeing tool that makes it easy and simple to focus on your health at work. ⠀ It integrates with your calendar and monitors and schedules physical and mental health breaks when you’re free so you can think, feel and perform better.
next.title: WellBuddy - Helping you find time to focus on your wellbeing at work

localize.description: WellBuddy是一款智能健康工具，让您在工作中轻松简单地关注健康。⠀ 它与您的日历集成，并在您空闲时监控和安排身体和心理健康休息时间，以便您可以更好地思考、感受和执行。
localize.tagline: 帮助您找到时间专注于工作中的健康。

localize.description: WellBuddy是一款智能健康工具，讓您在工作中輕鬆簡單地關注健康。⠀ 它與您的日曆集成，並在您空閒時監控和安排身體和心理健康休息時間，以便您可以更好地思考、感受和執行。
localize.tagline: 幫助您找到時間專注於工作中的健康。
